products.productDescription: RemoteToPC includes remote system health monitoring, critical system alerts, and remote desktop access. products.productTagLine: Work remotely from any place
products.productDescription: Zoho Remotely is a remote working suite from the house of Zoho. The software allows users to manage their work and company from any place on Earth. products.productDescription: Splashtop Business Access is a remote desktop solution for business professionals and small teams. products.productTagLine: Confidently adopt remote workflow
products.productDescription: Remotedesk is an advanced AI-based remote workforce management software. It is a platform that helps the users to adopt a remote workforce with comfort and confidence. It consists of virtual supervision technology that tracks the workflow of employees and maintains accountability. Remotedesk enables secure document sharing, reporting and compliance management solution for remote attorneys. In corporate sectors, it offloads the compliance of HR and other administrative tasks with utmost proficiency. It even consists of human capital management, cognitive workforce recruitment and talent acquisition while controlling the hiring costs involved.

products.productTagLine: Voice Messaging for Remote Teams
products.productDescription: Yac Screen Sharing is a true asynchronous collaboration for the future of work.
